name: CPSessionConfigurationDelegate
desc: A protocol for receiving notifications about changes to vehicle properties and configuration.

items.name: func sessionConfiguration(CPSessionConfiguration, contentStyleChanged: CPContentStyle)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the vehicle changed its selected content style.

items.name: func sessionConfiguration(CPSessionConfiguration, limitedUserInterfacesChanged: CPLimitableUserInterface)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the system changed keyboard or list limits on the user interface.
